column4: Failed to start the fire wall The device eth2 is not ready <------ what the freak is that I'm using Internet trough it?!
Also I have another ppp0 connection which seems to have the almost the same traffic up/down. What do?
I can't get firestarter to work. It returns an error
I says device isn't ready but I'm using the internet trough it
Failed to start the fire wall The device eth2 is not ready <------ what the freak is that I'm using Internet trough it?!
I followed it 3 times already this week :p
what are you connecting with over the net? wlan0?
I would use ufw.  Firestarter isn't being maintained if I recall correctly
Change the option so it's not monitoring eth2
check firestarter setting/options to see what it's monitoring (eth0, wlan0, etc)
sorry, where are you now with your firestarter issue?
find out what active connection you're using, and set firestarter to monitor that connection.  Does that not work?
